# Keyboard Shortcuts

Oct 17, 2025 Trying to store these in Raycast Notes for easy usage (`Option + .`)

## System shortcuts

#### Global application triggers

`Cmd-Space`  Raycast

`Opt-Space`  Akiflow Task Entry

`Ctrl-Space` LLM

`Cmd-j`         Clickup Task/Search

`Opt-Cmd-/ `Enpass

#### Screen capture

`Cmd-Shift-{5,4,3}` Capture {Window, Area, Screen}

`Cmd-Shift-6` Capture Video

`Cmd-Shift-7` Pixel measurement (Pixelsnap)

`Cmd-Shift-8` Screenshit utility

`Cmd-Shift-9` Annotate the clipboard

#### Text replacements

`Opt-'`  enquoten (**via BTT**)

#### Navigating desktops and stage manager

`Opt-[1..6]` stage manager index 

`Opt arrow-up` list stages menu (down to select) 

`Opt arrow-down` stage manager cycle

#### Window management

`Cmd Ctrl f` or `[üåê](https://app.heptabase.com/2f7caf87-d999-4778-8e30-61689601271e/card/7cc24298-948f-4b95-ab89-bc46bc1b0cde)``+ f` Maximize/un-maximize window (macos built-in)

`Ctrl up` Mission Control

`Ctrl down` Application Windows



## Applications shortcuts



### Vim (nvim)

[Vim!Nvim Learning.md](./Vim!Nvim%20Learning.md)

### Tana

`Cmd-k` Tana‚Äôs command line

`Cmd-s` Tana‚Äôs search

### Heptabase

`Cmd + e` Toggle source code

[Reference](https://wiki.heptabase.com/keyboard-shortcuts)

NOTE: Use sections. Enabled `Shift + {1,2}` easy zoom.

NEW

- `Shift + 1` fFy zoom out

- `Shift + 2` Zoom to selected object

- `Spacebar + Left finger drag` Drag the board around

LEARNED

- `Cmd + K` Command Palette (usually Cmd-P)

- `Cmd + o` Card search. *(what?)*

- `Cmd + f` Text search *(ah.)*

Reused system shortcuts:

- `Cmd + n` New note

- `Cmd + w` Close tab

### VSCode

`Cmd-p` and `Cmd-Shift-p`

### Finder

`Right-click + Option` When right-clicked, press Option (Alt) key to open more options, including to copy the path of a folder

`Cmd Shift .` Show hidden files
